dcterms:creator: L. C. Neto
G. L. B. Ramalho
J. F. Neto
R. M. S. Veras
F. N. S. Medeiros
dcterms:description: The DRIVE dataset includes 40 color retinal fundus images with a resolution of (565, 584). It is divided into a training set with 20 images and a test set with 20 images, each containing labeled vessel images.
dcterms:title: DRIVE

dcterms:creator: A. Hoover
V. Kouznetsova
M. Goldbaum
dcterms:description: The STARE dataset contains 20 retinal fundus images, each with a resolution of 700×605. It is commonly used with a 'leave one out' strategy for training and testing.
dcterms:title: STARE

dcterms:creator: C. G. Owen
A. Rudnicka
R. Mullen
S. Barman
D. Monekosso
P. Whincup
dcterms:description: The CHASEDB1 dataset consists of 28 retinal fundus images with a resolution of 999×960 pixels, divided into a training set of 20 images and a test set of 8 images.
dcterms:title: CHASEDB1

dcterms:creator: B. Attila
B. Rüdiger
M. Andreas
H. Joachim
M. Georg
dcterms:description: The HRF dataset includes retinal images with a resolution of 3504×2336, categorized into three subsets: healthy, diabetic retinopathy, and glaucomatous, each containing 15 images.
dcterms:title: HRF
